# AutoFemto - Privacy-First Online Tools & Development Services

> https://autofemto.com

## About
AutoFemto provides free, privacy-first online tools with 100% browser-based processing. We also offer professional web development, automation, and AI integration services.

## Core Services
- Web Development: Full-stack development services for modern websites and web applications
- Automation & AI: Workflow automation and AI integration solutions
- Custom Tools: Specialized calculators, converters, and utilities tailored to specific needs

## Free Privacy-First Tools
All tools process data entirely in your browser - nothing is sent to our servers.

### Developer Tools
- JSON Formatter & Validator: Format, validate, and minify JSON data
- Base64 Encoder/Decoder: Encode and decode Base64 strings
- Hash Generator: Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, and other hashes
- CSV to JSON Converter: Convert CSV files to JSON format

### Productivity Tools
- Text Tools: Case converter, word counter, character counter
- Stopwatch: Precision timing with lap functionality
- Countdown Timer: Set timers with audio alerts
- QR Code Generator: Create custom QR codes instantly

### Utility Tools
- Unit Converter: Convert length, weight, temperature, volume, and more
- Color Picker: Get HEX, RGB, and HSL color codes
- Image Resizer: Resize and convert images without uploading
- Compound Interest Calculator: Calculate investment growth

## Educational Content
Visit our blog for guides on privacy-first development, tool tutorials, and productivity strategies:
https://autofemto.com/blog/

## Privacy Philosophy
We believe your data should stay yours. All our tools run entirely in your browser using client-side JavaScript. No data is collected, stored, or transmitted to any server.

## Contact
For custom development services or inquiries:
https://autofemto.com/contact.html
